mention.text: Hundreds of demonstrators demands for President Hussain Muhammad Ershad

a top leader of the Democratic Party It is one of eight parties in an alliance headed by the Awami League led by Sheik Hasina , one of the country 's main opposition politicians Ershad has dismissed the campaign against President Hussain Muhammad Ershad as '' the work of a handful of violence-mongers who are out to destabilize Bangladesh
the latest tactic in the campaign
At least eight people have been killed by police
